text: I love the chinese teacher in this tuition that teaches during 11.30am to 1pm, shes very friendly and just full of life, its easy to get along with her and she makes you have the ability to answer questions freely,  shes super super duper and i hope she continues to teach as well !!!
Staff is very proactive and friendly. The teachers are knowledgeable.
My experience here was excellent.This tuition center has amazing teachers. It helped my math and science a lot. I would recommend people to come to this tuition.

Staff are very friendly and nice. Helps me to understand more of the concepts of what I am unsure of like chemistry in chemical bonding. I learn how precise my answers must be to make sure I get the full mark on that question
Very caring and thoughtful receptionist. Dedicated staff in Mavis. Teachers teach with commitment, dedication, patience, passion and precision. Thank you Mavis!
